/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, divided by a green median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on both sides. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise up to meet the overcast sky. A few construction cranes punctuate the skyline, hinting at the city's continuous growth and development. The street is lined with trees, their leaves a vibrant splash of green against the concrete jungle. Streetlights stand sentinel along the road, ready to bathe the scene in light as dusk falls. Despite the overcast sky, the city is alive and vibrant, a testament to Beijing's ceaseless energy and dynamism.
